long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This addon is specifically designed to assist users who type in Persian and Swedish languages on a multilingual keyboard. It automatically converts Persian text to Swedish, even if the user has typed it with the incorrect input method. It's worth noting that this version of the addon is only capable of converting Persian text to Swedish, and doesn't support any other language pairs.
